attributes.action: Not hand over power to Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister was elected to serve a full term and not bow out when the going got tough, he should instead call a general election so the people of this nation can decide who they want to lead,if he wishes to resign he should let the people have a say and not just hand over power to whoever he regards as the best bet to win the next election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
